column2: I need to monitor thermal zones and retrieve two consecutive temperature values with timestamps to prevent overheating.
I want the device driver to handle hardware interrupts and return proper error codes for invalid IOCTL operations.
I need the system to implement redundancy and fault detection with automatic recovery to meet ISO 26262.
I want to sign up and login so I can access my dashboard securely with MFA.
I want to export generated test cases to CSV/Excel so I can review them offline.
